verses.kjv: Now concerning spiritual gifts, brethren, I would not have you ignorant.
verses.web: Now concerning spiritual things, brothers, I don’t want you to be ignorant.
verses.ct: Now, brothers, I want you to be well-informed about spiritual gifts.

verses.kjv: Ye know that ye were Gentiles, carried away unto these dumb idols, even as ye were led.
verses.web: You know that when you were heathen, you were led away to those mute idols, however you might be led.
verses.ct: You remember that before you believed, you were pagans — pulled along and led astray by mute idols that couldn't even speak.

verses.kjv: Wherefore I give you to understand, that no man speaking by the Spirit of God calleth Jesus accursed: and that no man can say that Jesus is the Lord, but by the Holy Ghost.
verses.web: Therefore I make known to you that no man speaking by God’s Spirit says, “Jesus is accursed.” No one can say, “Jesus is Lord,” but by the Holy Spirit.
verses.ct: So let me make this clear: no one speaking by the spirit of God ever says, "Jesus is cursed," and no one can say, "Jesus is Lord," except by the Holy Spirit.

verses.kjv: Now there are diversities of gifts, but the same Spirit.
verses.web: Now there are various kinds of gifts, but the same Spirit.
verses.ct: There are different kinds of gifts, but they all come from the same Spirit.

verses.kjv: And there are differences of administrations, but the same Lord.
verses.web: There are various kinds of service, and the same Lord.
verses.ct: There are different kinds of service, but they're all directed by the same Lord.

verses.kjv: And there are diversities of operations, but it is the same God which worketh all in all.
verses.web: There are various kinds of workings, but the same God, who works all things in all.
verses.ct: There are different ways God works through people, but it's the same God doing the work in all of them.

verses.kjv: But the manifestation of the Spirit is given to every man to profit withal.
verses.web: But to each one is given the manifestation of the Spirit for the profit of all.
verses.ct: The Spirit shows up in each person's life in a unique way, and it's always meant to benefit everyone.

verses.kjv: For to one is given by the Spirit the word of wisdom; to another the word of knowledge by the same Spirit;
verses.web: For to one is given through the Spirit the word of wisdom, and to another the word of knowledge, according to the same Spirit;
verses.ct: The Spirit gives one person a message of wisdom, and another a message of knowledge through that same Spirit.

verses.kjv: To another faith by the same Spirit; to another the gifts of healing by the same Spirit;
verses.web: to another faith, by the same Spirit; and to another gifts of healings, by the same Spirit;
verses.ct: To another the same Spirit gives extraordinary faith, and to yet another, gifts of healing.

verses.kjv: To another the working of miracles; to another prophecy; to another discerning of spirits; to another divers kinds of tongues; to another the interpretation of tongues:
verses.web: and to another workings of miracles; and to another prophecy; and to another discerning of spirits; to another different kinds of languages; and to another the interpretation of languages.
verses.ct: One person receives the power to perform miracles, another the gift of prophecy, another the ability to tell the difference between spirits, another the ability to speak in different tongues, and another the ability to interpret those tongues.

verses.kjv: But all these worketh that one and the selfsame Spirit, dividing to every man severally as he will.
verses.web: But the one and the same Spirit produces all of these, distributing to each one separately as he desires.
verses.ct: But one and the same Spirit produces all of these gifts, distributing them to each person individually, exactly as he chooses.

verses.kjv: For as the body is one, and hath many members, and all the members of that one body, being many, are one body: so also is Christ.
verses.web: For as the body is one, and has many members, and all the members of the body, being many, are one body; so also is Christ.
verses.ct: A human body is a single unit, even though it has many parts. All those different parts still make up one body. It's the same way with Christ.

verses.kjv: For by one Spirit are we all baptized into one body, whether we be Jews or Gentiles, whether we be bond or free; and have been all made to drink into one Spirit.
verses.web: For in one Spirit we were all baptized into one body, whether Jews or Greeks, whether bond or free; and were all given to drink into one Spirit.
verses.ct: We were all baptized by one Spirit into one body — whether Jewish or Greek, slave or free — and we were all given the same Spirit to drink.

verses.kjv: For the body is not one member, but many.
verses.web: For the body is not one member, but many.
verses.ct: After all, a body isn't made up of just one part. It has many.

verses.kjv: If the foot shall say, Because I am not the hand, I am not of the body; is it therefore not of the body?
verses.web: If the foot would say, “Because I’m not the hand, I’m not part of the body,” it is not therefore not part of the body.
verses.ct: If the foot said, "I'm not a hand, so I don't belong to the body," that wouldn't actually make it any less a part of the body.

verses.kjv: And if the ear shall say, Because I am not the eye, I am not of the body; is it therefore not of the body?
verses.web: If the ear would say, “Because I’m not the eye, I’m not part of the body,” it’s not therefore not part of the body.
verses.ct: If the ear said, "I'm not an eye, so I don't belong to the body," that wouldn't make it any less a part of the body either.

verses.kjv: If the whole body were an eye, where were the hearing? If the whole were hearing, where were the smelling?
verses.web: If the whole body were an eye, where would the hearing be? If the whole were hearing, where would the smelling be?
verses.ct: If the whole body were an eye, how would you hear anything? If the whole body were an ear, how would you smell anything?

verses.kjv: But now hath God set the members every one of them in the body, as it hath pleased him.
verses.web: But now God has set the members, each one of them, in the body, just as he desired.
verses.ct: But God placed each part in the body exactly where he wanted it.

verses.kjv: And if they were all one member, where were the body?
verses.web: If they were all one member, where would the body be?
verses.ct: If everything were the same part, there wouldn't be a body at all!

verses.kjv: But now are they many members, yet but one body.
verses.web: But now they are many members, but one body.
verses.ct: The reality is that there are many parts, but they form one body.

verses.kjv: And the eye cannot say unto the hand, I have no need of thee: nor again the head to the feet, I have no need of you.
verses.web: The eye can’t tell the hand, “I have no need for you,” or again the head to the feet, “I have no need for you.”
verses.ct: The eye can't tell the hand, "I don't need you." The head can't tell the feet, "I don't need you."

verses.kjv: Nay, much more those members of the body, which seem to be more feeble, are necessary:
verses.web: No, much rather, those members of the body which seem to be weaker are necessary.
verses.ct: In fact, the parts of the body that seem the weakest turn out to be the most essential.

verses.kjv: And those members of the body, which we think to be less honourable, upon these we bestow more abundant honour; and our uncomely parts have more abundant comeliness.
verses.web: Those parts of the body which we think to be less honorable, on those we bestow more abundant honor; and our unpresentable parts have more abundant propriety;
verses.ct: The parts we consider less dignified, we treat with extra care. The parts that aren't presentable, we cover with special modesty.

verses.kjv: For our comely parts have no need: but God hath tempered the body together, having given more abundant honour to that part which lacked:
verses.web: whereas our presentable parts have no such need. But God composed the body together, giving more abundant honor to the inferior part,
verses.ct: Our more presentable parts don't need that kind of attention. But God designed the body so that extra honor goes to the parts that lack it.

verses.kjv: That there should be no schism in the body; but that the members should have the same care one for another.
verses.web: that there should be no division in the body, but that the members should have the same care for one another.
verses.ct: He did this so there would be no division in the body, but instead every part would care equally for all the others.

verses.kjv: And whether one member suffer, all the members suffer with it; or one member be honoured, all the members rejoice with it.
verses.web: When one member suffers, all the members suffer with it. When one member is honored, all the members rejoice with it.
verses.ct: When one part suffers, every part suffers with it. When one part is honored, every part celebrates with it.

verses.kjv: Now ye are the body of Christ, and members in particular.
verses.web: Now you are the body of Christ, and members individually.
verses.ct: Together, you are the body of Christ, and each of you is an individual part of it.

verses.kjv: And God hath set some in the church, first apostles, secondarily prophets, thirdly teachers, after that miracles, then gifts of healings, helps, governments, diversities of tongues.
verses.web: God has set some in the assembly: first apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then miracle workers, then gifts of healings, helps, governments, and various kinds of languages.
verses.ct: In the church, God has appointed first apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then miracle workers, then those with gifts of healing, those who help others, those who lead, and those who speak in different tongues.

verses.kjv: Are all apostles? are all prophets? are all teachers? are all workers of miracles?
verses.web: Are all apostles? Are all prophets? Are all teachers? Are all miracle workers?
verses.ct: Is everyone an apostle? Is everyone a prophet? Is everyone a teacher? Does everyone work miracles?

verses.kjv: Have all the gifts of healing? do all speak with tongues? do all interpret?
verses.web: Do all have gifts of healings? Do all speak with various languages? Do all interpret?
verses.ct: Does everyone have gifts of healing? Does everyone speak in tongues? Does everyone interpret?

verses.kjv: But covet earnestly the best gifts: and yet shew I unto you a more excellent way.
verses.web: But earnestly desire the best gifts. Moreover, I show a most excellent way to you.
verses.ct: Eagerly pursue the greater gifts. But now let me show you a way that surpasses them all.
